name: Lumen Mono
desc: Lumen Mono is a group of seven young enthusiasts who persevered through 17 iterations under Bortle 9 conditions to establish our foundational observatory.
history: Started as a tiny project, went through 17 iterations, each one learning and improving.
goals: To explore and document active sublumens in the constellation, learning as we go.
fun_fact: We are literally 7 kids doing astronomical work under Bortle 9 light levels
